column4: hello.  I'm looking to buy a desktop that either does NOT have any form of windows on it, either with ubuntu, or no OS at all.  anybody know any companies that do this?
well i want to buy like a sort of the top of the line computer.. cuz i'll probably put a performance edition of XP on 'later'
dell sell ubuntu machines; system76 does it too. and my favourite buy parts and build the machine yourself ;)
